position.marginalia_text: Ratio cur stell[a]e fixa[e], hic illic in coelo sparga[n]tur.

marginalia.translation: The reason why fixed stars are spread across in the sky.

marginalia.anchor_text: Iupiter per singulorum annorum motum facit
marginalia.translation: Separating Jupiter's movement in the Zodiac in [..] parts.

position.marginalia_text: Cur planeta[e] in suis motibus varias qualitates terrestrib[us] inducant

marginalia.translation: Why the planets induce various qualities on the land in their motions.

marginalia.anchor_text: Sationes in Solis distantia in Saturno quidem faltem 108

position.marginalia_text: Stationes PL[...] pro exemplo vide in ephemeride illa 1532. in februario saturni statione[m] a solis loca distare gradus 108 [etc].

marginalia.translation: The stations [...], for example see in that ephemeris, February 1532, that the station of Saturn stands apart 108 degrees from the sun, et cetera.

underline.text: Alij ob rationem diuersarum opinionum in motu earum, loca incerta ipsarum
diuisionem Iupiter per singulorum annorum motum fact, par aut[em] erat, hanc fieri à fortuna, Soli amica

At caeterae erraticae, praeter haec habent uim diuersam, quam inferioribus his influant, uel ex motu in paruo circulo, uel in latitudinem, uel in comparatione partium, quae uberius uim ipsius Solis susceperunt

mark.name: bracket
mark.text: At caeterae erraticae, praeter haec habent uim diuersam, quam inferioribus his influant, uel ex motu in paruo circulo, uel in latitudinem, uel in comparatione partium, quae uberius uim ipsius Solis susceperunt
